pli-tv-kd9:1.1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā campāyaṁ viharati gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena kāsīsu janapade vāsabhagāmo nāma hoti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.3_0: Tattha kassapagotto nāma bhikkhu āvāsiko hoti tantibaddho ussukkaṁ āpanno—
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.4_1: āgatā ca pesalā bhikkhū phāsu vihareyyuṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.4_2: ayañca āvāso vuddhiṁ viruḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.5_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū kāsīsu cārikaṁ caramānā yena vāsabhagāmo tadavasaruṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.6_0: Addasā kho kassapagotto bhikkhu te bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante,
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.7_0: Atha kho tesaṁ āgantukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.9_0: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, idheva vāsabhagāme nivāsaṁ kappemā”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.1.10_0: Atha kho te āgantukā bhikkhū tattheva vāsabhagāme nivāsaṁ kappesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.2_0: “yo kho imesaṁ āgantukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ āgantukakilamatho so paṭippassaddho.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.3_0: Yepime gocare appakataññuno tedānime gocare pakataññuno.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.4_0: Dukkaraṁ kho pana parakulesu yāvajīvaṁ ussukkaṁ kātuṁ, viññatti ca manussānaṁ amanāpā.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.5_0: Yannūnāhaṁ na ussukkaṁ kareyyaṁ yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmin”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.6_0: So na ussukkaṁ akāsi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.7_0: Atha kho tesaṁ āgantukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.9_0: Sodānāyaṁ na ussukkaṁ karoti yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.2.11_0: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, āvāsikaṁ bhikkhuṁ ukkhipāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.3.1_0: Atha kho te āgantukā bhikkhū sannipatitvā kassapagottaṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd9:1.3.2_0: “pubbe kho tvaṁ, āvuso, nahāne ussukkaṁ karosi, ussukkampi karosi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.3.3_0: Sodāni tvaṁ na ussukkaṁ karosi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.3.7_0: Atha kho te āgantukā bhikkhū kassapagottaṁ bhikkhuṁ āpattiyā adassane ukkhipiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd9:1.3.9_0: “ahaṁ kho etaṁ na jānāmi ‘āpatti vā esā anāpatti vā,
pli-tv-kd9:1.3.10_0: Yannūnāhaṁ campaṁ gantvā bhagavantaṁ etamatthaṁ puccheyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.4.1_0: Atha kho kassapagotto bhikkhu senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena campā tena pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd9:1.4.2_0: Anupubbena yena campā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
pli-tv-kd9:1.4.3_0: Āciṇṇaṁ kho panetaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammodituṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.4.4_0: Atha kho bhagavā kassapagottaṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.1_0: Atthi, bhante, kāsīsu janapade vāsabhagāmo nāma.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.2_0: Tatthāhaṁ, bhagavā, āvāsiko tantibaddho ussukkaṁ āpanno—
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.3_1: āgatā ca pesalā bhikkhū phāsu vihareyyuṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.3_2: ayañca āvāso vuddhiṁ viruḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjeyyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.4_0: Atha kho, bhante, sambahulā bhikkhū kāsīsu cārikaṁ caramānā yena vāsabhagāmo tadavasaruṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.6_0: Atha kho tesaṁ, bhante, āgantukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.7_0: ‘bhaddako kho ayaṁ āvuso āvāsiko bhikkhu nahāne ussukkaṁ karoti,
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.8_0: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, idheva vāsabhagāme nivāsaṁ kappemā’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.9_0: Atha kho te, bhante, āgantukā bhikkhū tattheva vāsabhagāme nivāsaṁ kappesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.11_0: ‘yo kho imesaṁ āgantukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ āgantukakilamatho so paṭippassaddho.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.12_0: Yepime gocare appakataññuno tedānime gocare pakataññuno.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.13_0: Dukkaraṁ kho pana parakulesu yāvajīvaṁ ussukkaṁ kātuṁ, viññatti ca manussānaṁ amanāpā.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.14_0: Yannūnāhaṁ na ussukkaṁ kareyyaṁ yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmin’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.15_0: So kho ahaṁ, bhante, na ussukkaṁ akāsiṁ yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.16_0: Atha kho tesaṁ, bhante, āgantukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.18_0: Sodānāyaṁ na ussukkaṁ karoti yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.20_0: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, āvāsikaṁ bhikkhuṁ ukkhipāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.21_0: Atha kho te, bhante, āgantukā bhikkhū sannipatitvā maṁ etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.22_0: ‘pubbe kho tvaṁ, āvuso, nahāne ussukkaṁ karosi, ussukkampi karosi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.23_0: Sodāni tvaṁ na ussukkaṁ karosi yāguyā khādanīye bhattasmiṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.27_0: Atha kho te, bhante, āgantukā bhikkhū maṁ āpattiyā adassane ukkhipiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.29_0: ‘ahaṁ kho etaṁ na jānāmi “āpatti vā esā anāpatti vā,
pli-tv-kd9:1.5.30_0: Yannūnāhaṁ campaṁ gantvā bhagavantaṁ etamatthaṁ puccheyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.6.5_0: Gaccha tvaṁ, bhikkhu, tattheva vāsabhagāme nivāsaṁ kappehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.6.6_1: bhante”ti kho kassapagotto bhikkhu bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yena vāsabhagāmo tena pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.1_0: Atha kho tesaṁ āgantukānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ ahudeva kukkuccaṁ, ahu vippaṭisāro—
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.2_0: “alābhā vata no, na vata no lābhā;
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.3_2: ye mayaṁ suddhaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpattikaṁ avatthusmiṁ akāraṇe ukkhipimhā.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.4_0: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, campaṁ gantvā bhagavato santike accayaṁ accayato desemā”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.5_0: Atha kho te āgantukā bhikkhū senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena campā tena pakkamiṁsu.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.6_0: Anupubbena yena campā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu,
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.7_0: Āciṇṇaṁ kho panetaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammodituṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.8_0: Atha kho bhagavā te bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.13_0: appakilamathena ca mayaṁ, bhante, addhānaṁ āgatā.
pli-tv-kd9:1.7.14_0: Atthi, bhante, kāsīsu janapade vāsabhagāmo nāma.
pli-tv-kd9:1.8.6_0: “ananucchavikaṁ, moghapurisā, ananulomikaṁ appatirūpaṁ assāmaṇakaṁ akappiyaṁ akaraṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:1.8.7_0: Kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, suddhaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpattikaṁ avatthusmiṁ akāraṇe ukkhipissatha.
pli-tv-kd9:1.8.9_0: vigarahitvā dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd9:1.8.10_0: “na, bhikkhave, suddho bhikkhu anāpattiko avatthusmiṁ akāraṇe ukkhipitabbo.
pli-tv-kd9:1.9.1_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd9:1.9.2_2: ye mayaṁ suddhaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpattikaṁ avatthusmiṁ akāraṇe ukkhipimhā.
pli-tv-kd9:1.9.3_0: Tesaṁ no, bhante, bhagavā accayaṁ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu āyatiṁ saṁvarāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd9:1.9.4_3: ye tumhe suddhaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpattikaṁ avatthusmiṁ akāraṇe ukkhipittha.
pli-tv-kd9:1.9.6_2: ariyassa vinaye yo accayaṁ accayato disvā yathādhammaṁ paṭikaroti,
pli-tv-kd9:2.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena campāyaṁ bhikkhū evarūpāni kammāni karonti—
pli-tv-kd9:2.1.2_0: adhammena vaggakammaṁ karonti, adhammena samaggakammaṁ karonti;
pli-tv-kd9:2.1.3_0: dhammena vaggakammaṁ karonti, dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ karonti;
pli-tv-kd9:2.1.5_0: ekopi ekaṁ ukkhipati, ekopi dve ukkhipati, ekopi sambahule ukkhipati, ekopi saṅghaṁ ukkhipati;
pli-tv-kd9:2.1.6_0: dvepi ekaṁ ukkhipanti, dvepi dve ukkhipanti, dvepi sambahule ukkhipanti, dvepi saṅghaṁ ukkhipanti;
pli-tv-kd9:2.1.8_0: sambahulāpi dve ukkhipanti, sambahulāpi sambahule ukkhipanti, sambahulāpi saṅghaṁ ukkhipanti;
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.1_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.2_0: “kathañhi nāma campāyaṁ bhikkhū evarūpāni kammāni karissanti—
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.4_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.5_0: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, campāyaṁ bhikkhū evarūpāni kammāni karonti—
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.10_2: tesaṁ moghapurisānaṁ ananulomikaṁ appatirūpaṁ assāmaṇakaṁ akappiyaṁ akaraṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.2.11_0: Kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā evarūpāni kammāni karissanti—
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.1_0: “Adhammena ce, bhikkhave, vaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.2_0: adhammena samaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.3_0: dhammena vaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.4_0: dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.5_0: dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.6_0: ekopi ekaṁ ukkhipati akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.7_0: ekopi dve ukkhipati akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.8_0: ekopi sambahule ukkhipati akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.9_0: ekopi saṅghaṁ ukkhipati akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.10_0: dvepi ekaṁ ukkhipanti akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.11_0: dvepi dve ukkhipanti akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.12_0: dvepi sambahule ukkhipanti akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.13_0: dvepi saṅghaṁ ukkhipanti akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.14_0: sambahulāpi ekaṁ ukkhipanti akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.15_0: sambahulāpi dve ukkhipanti akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.16_0: sambahulāpi sambahule ukkhipanti akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.17_0: sambahulāpi saṅghaṁ ukkhipanti akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;,
pli-tv-kd9:2.3.18_0: saṅghopi saṅghaṁ ukkhipati akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.2_0: adhammena vaggakammaṁ, adhammena samaggakammaṁ, dhammena vaggakammaṁ, dhammena samaggakammaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.4_0: na, bhikkhave, evarūpaṁ kammaṁ kātabbaṁ, na ca mayā evarūpaṁ kammaṁ anuññātaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.6_0: na, bhikkhave, evarūpaṁ kammaṁ kātabbaṁ, na ca mayā evarūpaṁ kammaṁ anuññātaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.8_0: na, bhikkhave, evarūpaṁ kammaṁ kātabbaṁ, na ca mayā evarūpaṁ kammaṁ anuññātaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.10_0: evarūpaṁ, bhikkhave, kammaṁ kātabbaṁ, evarūpañca mayā kammaṁ anuññātaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:2.4.11_0: Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, evarūpaṁ kammaṁ karissāma yadidaṁ dhammena samagganti—
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū evarūpāni kammāni karonti—
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.2_0: adhammena vaggakammaṁ karonti, adhammena samaggakammaṁ karonti;
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.6_0: paṭikuṭṭhakatampi kammaṁ karonti adhammikaṁ kuppaṁ aṭṭhānārahaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.7_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.8_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū evarūpāni kammāni karissanti—
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.9_0: adhammena vaggakammaṁ karissanti, adhammena samaggakammaṁ karissanti;
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.13_0: paṭikuṭṭhakatampi kammaṁ karissanti adhammikaṁ kuppaṁ aṭṭhānārahan”ti.

pli-tv-kd9:3.1.17_0: paṭikuṭṭhakatampi kammaṁ karonti adhammikaṁ kuppaṁ aṭṭhānārahan”ti?
pli-tv-kd9:3.1.20_0: vigarahitvā dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.1_0: “Adhammena ce, bhikkhave, vaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.2_0: adhammena samaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.3_0: dhammena vaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.4_0: dhammapatirūpakena vaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.5_0: dhammapatirūpakena samaggakammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.6_0: Ñattivipannañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ anussāvanasampannaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.7_0: anussāvanavipannañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ ñattisampannaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.8_0: ñattivipannañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ anussāvanavipannaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.9_0: aññatrāpi dhammā kammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.10_0: aññatrāpi vinayā kammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.11_0: aññatrāpi satthusāsanā kammaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ;
pli-tv-kd9:3.2.12_0: paṭikuṭṭhakatañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ adhammikaṁ kuppaṁ aṭṭhānārahaṁ akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ.

pli-tv-kd9:4.1.3_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ catuvaggo bhikkhusaṅgho, ṭhapetvā tīṇi kammāni—
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.4_0: upasampadaṁ pavāraṇaṁ abbhānaṁ, dhammena samaggo sabbakammesu kammappatto.
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.5_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ pañcavaggo bhikkhusaṅgho, ṭhapetvā dve kammāni—
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.6_0: majjhimesu janapadesu upasampadaṁ abbhānaṁ, dhammena samaggo sabbakammesu kammappatto.
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.7_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ dasavaggo bhikkhusaṅgho, ṭhapetvā ekaṁ kammaṁ—
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.9_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ vīsativaggo bhikkhusaṅgho dhammena samaggo sabbakammesu kammappatto.
pli-tv-kd9:4.1.10_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, yvāyaṁ atirekavīsativaggo bhikkhusaṅgho dhammena samaggo sabbakammesu kammappatto.
pli-tv-kd9:4.2.1_0: Catuvaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ bhikkhunicatuttho kammaṁ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.2.3_0: Catuvaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ sikkhamānacatuttho kammaṁ kareyya …
pli-tv-kd9:4.2.17_0: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhittakacatuttho kammaṁ kareyya …
pli-tv-kd9:4.2.47_0: Yassa saṅgho kammaṁ karoti, taṁcatuttho kammaṁ kareyya …

pli-tv-kd9:4.4.2_0: Dasavaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ bhikkhunidasamo kammaṁ kareyya, akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-kd9:4.4.3_0: Dasavaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ sikkhamānadasamo kammaṁ kareyya, akammaṁ na ca karaṇīyaṁ …

pli-tv-kd9:4.5.2_0: Vīsativaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ bhikkhunivīso kammaṁ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.5.4_0: Vīsativaggakaraṇañce, bhikkhave, kammaṁ sikkhamānavīso kammaṁ kareyya …pe…

pli-tv-kd9:4.5.26_0: yassa saṅgho kammaṁ karoti, taṁvīso kammaṁ kareyya—
pli-tv-kd9:4.7.1_0: Ekaccassa, bhikkhave, saṅghamajjhe paṭikkosanā ruhati, ekaccassa na ruhati.
pli-tv-kd9:4.7.2_0: Kassa ca, bhikkhave, saṅghamajjhe paṭikkosanā na ruhati?
pli-tv-kd9:4.7.3_0: Bhikkhuniyā, bhikkhave, saṅghamajjhe paṭikkosanā na ruhati.
pli-tv-kd9:4.7.28_2: yassa saṅgho kammaṁ karoti, tassa ca,
pli-tv-kd9:4.7.29_0: Imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, saṅghamajjhe paṭikkosanā na ruhati.
pli-tv-kd9:4.8.1_0: Kassa ca, bhikkhave, saṅghamajjhe paṭikkosanā ruhati?
pli-tv-kd9:4.8.2_2: pakatattassa samānasaṁvāsakassa samānasīmāya ṭhitassa antamaso ānantarikassāpi bhikkhuno viññāpentassa saṅghamajjhe paṭikkosanā ruhati.
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.3_0: Tañce saṅgho nissāreti, ekacco sunissārito, ekacco dunnissārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.4_0: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto nissāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho nissāreti—dunnissārito?
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.5_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu suddho hoti anāpattiko. Tañce saṅgho nissāreti—dunnissārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.6_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto nissāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho nissāreti—dunnissārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.7_0: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto nissāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho nissāreti—sunissārito?
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.8_2: bhikkhu bālo hoti abyatto āpattibahulo anapadāno,
pli-tv-kd9:4.9.9_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto nissāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho nissāreti—sunissārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.2_0: Atthi, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto osāraṇaṁ tañce saṅgho osāreti, ekacco sosārito, ekacco dosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.3_0: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto osāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho osāreti—dosārito?
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.4_0: Paṇḍako, bhikkhave, appatto osāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho osāreti—dosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.5_0: Theyyasaṁvāsako, bhikkhave, appatto osāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho osāreti—dosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.14_0: ubhatobyañjanako, bhikkhave, appatto, osāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho osāreti—dosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.15_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto osāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho osāreti—dosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.10.16_0: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, puggalā appattā osāraṇaṁ, te ce saṅgho osāreti—dosāritā.
pli-tv-kd9:4.11.1_0: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto osāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho osāreti—sosārito?
pli-tv-kd9:4.11.2_0: Hatthacchinno, bhikkhave, appatto osāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho osāreti, sosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.11.33_0: andhamūgabadhiro, bhikkhave, appatto osāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho osāreti—sosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.11.34_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo appatto osāraṇaṁ, tañce saṅgho osāreti—sosārito.
pli-tv-kd9:4.11.35_0: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, puggalā appattā osāraṇaṁ, te ce saṅgho osāreti—sosāritā.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa na hoti āpatti daṭṭhabbā.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.2_0: Tamenaṁ codeti saṅgho vā sambahulā vā ekapuggalo vā—
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.8_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa na hoti āpatti paṭikātabbā.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.9_0: Tamenaṁ codeti saṅgho vā sambahulā vā ekapuggalo vā—
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.10_0: ‘āpattiṁ tvaṁ, āvuso, āpanno, paṭikarohi taṁ āpattin’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.15_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa na hoti pāpikā diṭṭhi paṭinissajjetā.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.16_0: Tamenaṁ codeti saṅgho vā sambahulā vā ekapuggalo vā—
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.17_0: ‘pāpikā te, āvuso, diṭṭhi, paṭinissajjetaṁ pāpikaṁ diṭṭhin’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.19_0: ‘natthi me, āvuso, pāpikā diṭṭhi, yamahaṁ paṭinissajjeyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:5.1.20_0: Taṁ saṅgho pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhipati—
pli-tv-kd9:5.2.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa na hoti āpatti daṭṭhabbā, na hoti āpatti paṭikātabbā.

pli-tv-kd9:7.20.84_1: bhikkhu saṅghena pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammakato sammā vattati,
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.84_4: pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyassa kammassa paṭippassaddhiṁ yācati.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.85_0: Handassa mayaṁ pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhemā’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.86_0: Te tassa pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhepanīyakammaṁ paṭippassambhenti—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.93_5: akataṁ kammaṁ dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ puna kātabbaṁ kamman’ti.
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.94_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.95_0: ‘dhammapatirūpakena samaggakamman’ti, ye ca te bhikkhū evamāhaṁsu—
pli-tv-kd9:7.20.96_0: ‘akataṁ kammaṁ dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ puna kātabbaṁ kamman’ti, ime tattha bhikkhū dhammavādino.
